About

A graph plotting software very simple not too much complex built using javascript. Functions like Polynomial, Logarithmic, Trignometric and Exponential Functions. Additionally, it can calculate the roots and intercepts of Functions by giving the guess. We use webpack for bundling the javascript files & expr-eval node library for evaluating the expression.For More Details Visit Github
